mapper.insert: insert into chat (content, chatDtm, chatRoomNo,userNo, sendUserNo) values (#{content}, SYSDATE(), (select chatRoomNo from chatRoom where (userNo = #{getUserNo} and sendUserNo = #{sendUserNo}) OR (userNo = #{sendUserNo} AND sendUserNo = #{getUserNo})), #{getUserNo}, #{sendUserNo})
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( (SELECT chatRoomNo FROM chatRoom WHERE (userNo = #{getUserNo} AND sendUserNo = #{sendUserNo}) OR (userNo = #{sendUserNo} AND sendUserNo = #{getUserNo}) LIMIT 1), 0 ) AS chatRoomNo
mapper.insert: insert into chatRoom (createDtm, userNo, sendUserNo, chatName) values (SYSDATE(), #{getUserNo}, #{sendUserNo}, (select nickName from profile where userNo = #{getUserNo}))
mapper.select: select c.* ,p1.nickName as getUserName,p2.nickName as sendUserName from chat c, profile p1 , profile p2 where chatRoomNo = #{chatRoomNo} and c.userNo = p1.userNo and c.sendUserNo = p2.userNo
